comment._content: they were married in 1913 in Berlin, the story was extensively covered by the NYT, perhaps this was related as the driver doesn't look to be wearing an American coat but rather something court related. royalmusingsblogspotcom.blogspot.com/2008/07/victoria-lou...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Victoria Louise of Prussia (Viktoria Luise Adelheid Mathilde Charlotte; 13 September 1892 – 11 December 1980) was the only daughter and the seventh child of William II, German Emperor and Empress Augusta Victoria. She was their last surviving child. Princess Victoria Louise is the maternal grandmother of Queen Sophie of Spain and the former King Constantine II of the Hellenes. She was the Duchess of Brunswick by marriage. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Victoria_Louise_of_Prussia Ernest Augustus III (Ernest Augustus Christian George; German: Ernst August Christian Georg; 17 November 1887 – 30 January 1953), reigning Duke of Brunswick (2 November 1913 – 8 November 1918), was a grandson of George V of Hanover, whom the Prussians deposed in 1866. The last reigning monarch of the House of Hanover, Ernest Augustus was a direct descendant of Henry the Lion. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Augustus,_Duke_of_Brunswick
